title: [Snyk] SNYK-JS-NANOID-8492085 in nanoid@4.0.2
description:
## Improper Input Validation

**Severity:** medium
**Package:** nanoid@4.0.2
**File:** `dashboard/package.json`

**CVSS Score:** 6.3  
**Snyk Priority Score:** 315/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2024-55565](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-55565)

**Fix:** Pin `nanoid` to version 3.3.8, 5.0.9 or later.

### Details
## Overview

Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Improper Input Validation due to the mishandling of fractional values in the `nanoid` function. By exploiting this vulnerability, an attacker can achieve an infinite loop.
## Remediation
Upgrade `nanoid` to version 3.3.8, 5.0.9 or higher.
